captions.text:
WE HAVE A LOT OF FUN
ON THIS SHOW,

BUT I CANNOT REMEMBER
MOST OF IT.

SO HERE ARE A FEW
OF MY FAVORITE MOMENTS.

- I SAW, I CAME,
I CONQUERED

I MEAN,
THE BEST HOST TO EVER--

AND I'M SO GLAD
THAT, YOU KNOW,

THIS HAPPENED LAST NIGHT
WITH YOU.

MAMA SAID THAT EVERYONE
WOULD KNOW MY NAME

IF YOU THINK I'M BURNING OUT,
I'M NEVER AM

- 'CAUSE THERE'S A DIFFERENCE
BETWEEN BOYS AND GIRLS.

I BREASTFED NAHLA,
AND I'M NURSING MY BABY.

WHEN I WOULD PUT NAHLA
ON THE BOOB,

- I DON'T--I DON'T ENJOY
EITHER ONE.

I THINK
THEY'RE BOTH LOVELY MEN.

STICK AND STONES
MAY BREAK MY BONES

- I REALIZED I AM TERRIFIED
OF PORCELAIN DOLLS.

- I'M JUST ASKING BECAUSE--
- OH, MAN.

IS THAT NOT FREAKY
TO ANYONE ELSE?

THAT THIS CHICO RIGHT HERE
DON'T PLAY

THAT BOY'S FROM THE BOTTOM,
BOTTOM OF THE MAP

I GAVE SUSIE A LITTLE PAT
UP ON THE BOOTY

AND SHE TURNED AROUND AND SAID
WALK THIS WAY

AND I WANT TO PLAY A GAME
WITH YOU RIGHT NOW.

MEGGAN, DO YOU WANT
TO PLAY A GAME?

- I WAS LOOKING INTO THE CAMERA.
- WHAT'D YOU DO NOW?

- OH, MY GOSH.
LOOK AT HER BUTT.

OH, MY GOSH.
LOOK AT HER BUTT.

- I'M VERY HAPPY
THAT YOU HAVE THIS SHOW.

YOU SEEM REALLY HAPPY
ON THIS SHOW.

- AND THIS IS A--
A LOONY BIN, IS WHAT IT IS.

- WATCH WHAT HAPPENS
WHEN YOU HIT THIS BUTTON.

- OKAY.
- I MIGHT CURSE AT YOU.

I'M NOT GONNA LIE.
- THAT'S ALL RIGHT.

YOU'RE DOING THAT
OVER AND OVER AGAIN.

- HOW MANY Es
ARE IN THE WORDS

- WHAT DO YOU DO
FOR A LIVING, LOLITA?

- I TEACH FIRST GRADE.
- OH, NO.
